error.message: Call to deprecated method applyUpdates() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityDefinitionUpdateManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityDefinitionUpdateManagerInterface::getChangeList() and execute each entity type and field storage update manually instead.

Call to deprecated method applyUpdates() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityDefinitionUpdateManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityDefinitionUpdateManagerInterface::getChangeList() and execute each entity type and field storage update manually instead.

Call to deprecated method getLabel() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use $entity->label() instead. This method used to escape the entity label. The render system's autoescape is now relied upon.

Call to deprecated method link() of class Drupal\Core\Config\Entity\ConfigEntityBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\EntityInterface::toLink()->toString() instead.

Call to deprecated method applyUpdates() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityDefinitionUpdateManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityDefinitionUpdateManagerInterface::getChangeList() and execute each entity type and field storage update manually instead.

Call to deprecated method getFieldStorageDefinitions() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\Sql\SqlContentEntityStorage. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityFieldManagerInterface::getActiveFieldStorageDefinitions() instead.

Parameter $entityStorageMock of method Drupal\Tests\eck\Unit\EntityTypeBundleInfoTest::createNewTestSubjectWithEntityType() has typehint with deprecated interface PHPUnit_Framework_MockObject_MockObject: Use PHPUnit\Framework\MockObject\MockObject instead

Parameter $entityTypeMock of method Drupal\Tests\eck\Unit\EntityTypeBundleInfoTest::createNewTestSubjectWithEntityType() has typehint with deprecated interface PHPUnit_Framework_MockObject_MockObject: Use PHPUnit\Framework\MockObject\MockObject instead
Fetching class constant class of deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.

Return type of method Drupal\Tests\eck\Unit\UnitTestBase::getNewUserMock() has typehint with deprecated interface PHPUnit_Framework_MockObject_MockObject: Use PHPUnit\Framework\MockObject\MockObject instead
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to eck.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
